    • Method Detail

      • enterCustomerQueue

        public boolean enterCustomerQueue(int customerId,
                                  boolean payment)
        Customer enters queue to be attended by the Manager.
        Parameters:
        customerId - - Id of the customer to be attended
        payment - - type of attendance. (true/false) Pay for repair/Request repair.
        Returns:
        operation success so the thread can move on to the next operation.

      • attendCustomer

        public int attendCustomer()
        Operation to attend customer. Can be for receive payment or to initiate the repair of a car. Manager invokes this method.
        Returns:
        success of the operation so the Mechanic can move on or not to the next operation.

      • requestPart

        public boolean requestPart(int idType,
                           int number,
                           int mechanicId)
        Mechanic asks for a type of car parts for the repair
        Parameters:
        idType - - the id of the part to refill stock
        number - - the number of stock needed
        mechanicId - - the id of the mechanic
        Returns:
        true - request done. false - request has already been made.

        public int checksPartsRequest(int index)
        Manager checks if parts needs to be refilled
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
